verse.name: v1
verse.lines: ’Tis the blessèd hour of prayer, when our hearts lowly bend, And we gather to Jesus, our Savior and Friend; If we come to Him in faith, His protection to share, What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Blessèd hour of prayer, Blessèd hour of prayer; What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: ’Tis the blessèd hour of prayer, when the Savior draws near, With a tender compassion His children to hear; When He tells us we may cast at His feet every care, What a balm for the weary, O how sweet to be there!
